ALTAIR BLACK EMPLOYEE RESOURCE NETWORK (ABERN)
ABERN’s mission is to increase Black and African American employee and executive  
representation through global initiatives focused on advocacy, outreach, cultural understanding, 
and job development.ABERN
One of my key interests is in 
reinforcing the pipeline for 
diverse youth to access and succeed in STEM careers. ABERN stands poised to succeed in our vision: to chart the increase in allyship among Altairians around the world and empower them to make a difference in their communities.” 
W. Scott Richardson, Senior Specialist,
